channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: We the people platform at White House

item.description: White House Launches “We the People” Platform on Website On Sept. 22, the White House launched the “We the People” platform on its website. The platform is designed to encourage ideas from citizens, and if a petition on the site is signed by 5,000 people or more, the White House promises to lift it up […]
item.content:encoded:
White House Launches “We the People” Platform on Website

On Sept. 22, the White House launched the “We the People” platform on its website. The platform is designed to encourage ideas from citizens, and if a petition on the site is signed by 5,000 people or more, the White House promises to lift it up and have appropriate staff respond. Submit your ideas today.
